content.raw:
[@Ian Chen](https://bitbucket.org/iche033/)  How do we enter a command into the FC to do step 4?  It's easy if we have SSH, but direct SSH is only available in practice.  We have VPN and when I tried to SSH via the VPN connection, so that I could get to a terminal on the FC, it was refused.  I can SSH through the VPN if I give it the SSH key, but we will not have that available for the real runs.

How do we get a terminal that is running on the FC?
content.html:
@Ian Chen How do we enter a command into the FC to do step 4? It's easy if we have SSH, but direct SSH is only available in practice. We have VPN and when I tried to SSH via the VPN connection, so that I could get to a terminal on the FC, it was refused. I can SSH through the VPN if I give it the SSH key, but we will not have that available for the real runs.

How do we get a terminal that is running on the FC?
